The happines of the church, or, A description of those spirituall prerogatiues vvherewith Christ hath endowed her considered in some contemplations vpon part of the 12. chapter of the Hebrewes : together with certain other meditations and discourses vpon other portions of Holy Scriptures, the titles wherof immediately precede the booke : being the summe of diuerse sermons preached in S. Gregories London / by Thomas Adams ... Adams, Thomas, fl. 1612-1653.
[10], 443 [i.e. 427], [1], 375 [i.e. 376] p.
Printed by G.P. for Iohn Grismand, and are to be sold at his shop neere vnto the little north dore of Saint Pauls, at the signe of the Gun, London : 1619.
Signatures: *⁴ **¹ A-Z⁸ &⁸ [section]⁸ [2 sections]⁸ [3 sections]⁸(-[3 sections]8) 2A-3A⁸. Numerous errors in paging. Reproduction of original in the Trinity College (University of Cambridge). Library.
=======
